Implemented 3-layer defense: (1) Clean code - ghost methods eliminated, (2) Gate 13 enforcement - automated detection in pre-push hook, blocks deployment if old patterns detected, (3) SESSION_START_PS101.md - mandatory reading for future agents. All changes committed and pushed to production. CONTEXT PROVISIONING TEST: Created test protocol at .mosaic/CONTEXT_PROVISIONING_TEST.md to verify new sessions have sufficient context. NEXT AGENT: System operational, PS101 architecture protected against regression, protocols enforce completion verification and false claim prevention via pre-response checks.
